languages.text: Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.
languages.original_text: Единожды за бой, когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} этого существа падает ниже 60%, оно восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и может атаковать повторно.

traits.locale_text: Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.

Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.

languages.text: Единожды за бой, когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} этого существа падает ниже 60%, оно восстанавливает все {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и может атаковать повторно.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.

languages.text: 戦闘1回につき、この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が60％以下になると全ての{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が回復し、再び攻撃できるようになる。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘1回につき、この生物の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が60％以下になると全ての{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}が回復し、再び攻撃できるようになる。

languages.text: 当此生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于60%时，立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，并可以再次攻击。此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.

traits.locale_text: 当此生物{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于60%时，立刻恢复所有{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，并可以再次攻击。此效果每场战斗只能触发一次。

languages.text: Una vez por combate, cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan del 60 %, recupera todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y puede atacar otra vez.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.

traits.locale_text: Una vez por combate, cuando las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} de esta criatura bajan del 60 %, recupera todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y puede atacar otra vez.

languages.text: Einmal pro Kampf, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur unter 60 % sind, stellt sie alle {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} wieder her und kann erneut angreifen.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.

traits.locale_text: Einmal pro Kampf, wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} dieser Kreatur unter 60 % sind, stellt sie alle {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} wieder her und kann erneut angreifen.

languages.text: Une fois par combat, lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de cette créature passe sous la barre des 60 %, elle récupère tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et peut à nouveau attaquer.
languages.original_text: Once per combat, when this creature's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are below 60%, it restores all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and can attack again.

traits.locale_text: Une fois par combat, lorsque la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de cette créature passe sous la barre des 60 %, elle récupère tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et peut à nouveau attaquer.
